data.name: Pizza Dough
originalIngredient: 3 1/2 to 4 cups bread flour, plus more for rolling

data.name: Pizza Pizzas
originalIngredient: Olive oil, for the pizza crust
Flour, for dusting the pizza peel
1/2 teaspoon each chopped fresh herbs such as thyme, oregano, red pepper flakes, for example
A combination of 3 grated cheeses such as mozzarella, Monterey Jack, and provolone

data.name: Pizza Dough
originalIngredient: 3 cups 00 flour, plus more for dusting

data.name: Sausage Pan Pizza
originalIngredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for the bowl
2 cups bread flour, plus more as needed
8 ounces pork sausage, removed from casing
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Crushed red pepper flakes, as needed

data.name: Tenderoni Grilled Pizza
originalIngredient: All-purpose flour, for rolling the dough
8 ounces fresh store-bought pizza dough, or dough from your favorite local pizzeria, at room temperature
One 14-ounce can whole tomatoes, hand-crushed or run through a food mill
3 ounces fresh mozzarella, torn into pieces

data.name: Cast-Iron Pizza
originalIngredient: 1 pound frozen store-bought pizza dough, thawed and risen

data.name: Basic Pizza Dough
originalIngredient: 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for brushing
3 3/4 cups all-purpose flour, plus more for dusting

data.name: True Chicago-Style Deep-Dish Pizza
originalIngredient: 1/2 cup plus 3 tablespoons corn oil, plus additional for oiling the bowl
12 ounces deli sliced part skim mozzarella
One 28-ounce can whole San Marzano tomatoes, crushed by hand
Grated Parmesan, for topping and garnish

data.name: Western Omelette
originalIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 green bell pepper, cut into 1/2-inch dice
1/2 red bell pepper, cut into 1/2-inch dice
6 ounces boiled ham (in one piece), cut into 1/2-inch dice
1/2 cup grated white cheese (about 2 ounces), such as Monterey Jack, cheddar, or Gouda (optional)

data.name: Western Hash Brown Omelet
originalIngredient: 4 ounces thickly sliced deli ham, diced
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
3 cups frozen shredded hash browns (from a 1-pound bag; do not thaw)
4 ounces smoked gouda cheese, grated (about 1 1/2 cups)

data.name: Spaghetti Western
originalIngredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more if needed
1/2 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained
Red chile pepper flakes, for garnish
Fresh basil, sage and parsley, chopped, for garnish

data.name: BBQ Western Bacon Beer Can Burger
Western Skillet Eggs
originalIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 large green bell peppers, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch strips
1/4 pound thinly sliced ham, cut into 1-inch pieces
4 slices sourdough bread, torn into pieces (about 2 cups)
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, plus more for topping

data.name: Western-Style Grilled Spareribs
originalIngredient: 1/2 cup Peppery Dry Rub, recipe follows

data.name: Far Western Salsa
originalIngredient: 2 teaspoons Susie Q's Santa Maria Seasoning, recipe follows
2 to 3 drops hot sauce (recommended: Tabasco sauce)

data.name: South Western Sopaipillas
originalIngredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour, plus more for work surface
1 (15-ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 avocado, halved, pitted and flesh diced
3 ounces crumbled queso fresco, about 1/2 cup
Pinch salt and fresh ground black pepper

data.name: Mediterranean Orzo Salad
originalIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 1/2 cups red grape or cherry tomatoes
1 1/2 cups yellow grape or cherry tomatoes
1 1/2 cups crumbled feta cheese, plus more for topping
3 tablespoons minced fresh parsley, plus more for topping
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

data.name: Mediterranean Chicken
originalIngredient: 3 large chicken breast cutlets, pounded or thinly sliced
Juice of half a lemon, plus four slices of lemon
1/3 cup green olives (we use some marinated in herbs de Provence), pitted

data.name: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
originalIngredient: 1 pound tricolor pasta, such as bow tie or fusilli

data.name: Mediterranean Cod Packets
originalIngredient: 1 pound small Yukon gold potatoes, sliced about inch thick
4 skinless center-cut wild cod fillets (about 6 ounces each)
1/4 teaspoon finely grated lemon zest, plus 2 tablespoons lemon juice
1/4 cup pitted kalamata olives, coarsely chopped
2 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature

data.name: Mediterranean Turkey Burgers
originalIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
4 sesame hamburger buns or potato rolls, split and toasted
Lettuce and tomato slices, for topping
Lettuce and tomato slices, for topping

data.name: Mediterranean Salad
originalIngredient: 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus 1/4 cup
1 (1-pound) box Israeli couscous (or any small pasta)

data.name: Mediterranean Chicken Skillet
originalIngredient: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, thinly sliced
1 cup marinated quartered artichoke hearts, such as from an olive bar, with about 1/4 cup of the marinade
1/2 cup marinated small pitted olives, such as from an olive bar
1/2 cup roasted red peppers, such as from an olive bar
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley or 2 tablespoons lightly dried parsley, such as Gourmet Garden

data.name: Mediterranean Farro Salad
originalIngredient: 8 ounces green beans, cut into 1- to 2-inch pieces (about 2 cups)
1 medium red pepper, cut into thin strips (about 4 ounces or 1 cup)

data.name: Saag Paneer: Spinach with Indian Cheese
originalIngredient: 12 ounces paneer, (Indian cheese, either store-bought or made from my recipe, recipe follows), cut into 1-inch cubes, see Cook's Note*
1 (1-inch thumb) ginger, peeled and minced (about 1 tablespoon)
1 large green serrano chile, finely chopped (seeds removed if you don't like it spicy!)
1/2 teaspoon store-bought or homemade garam masala, recipe follows
1/2 cup plain yogurt, stirred until smooth
1/4 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice, plus more as needed, see Cook's Note*
3 large cinnamon sticks (if you have the kind you get at Indian stores, it's about 3 tablespoons of cinnamon bark bits)
1/4 cup green cardamom pods, shelled, husks discarded (about 2 tablespoons of seeds)
4 large black cardamom pods, shelled, husks discarded (about 1 tablespoon of seeds), optional

data.name: Paneer: Homemade Indian Cheese
originalIngredient: 1/4 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice, plus more as needed, see Cook's Note*

data.name: Indian Rice Pudding
originalIngredient: 1 cup cooked long grain or basmati rice
1 1/2 ounces chopped unsalted pistachios, approximately 1/3 cup

data.name: Indian-Spiced Pepper Steak
originalIngredient: 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 pounds beef flank, skirt or flap (bavette) steak
2 teaspoons chili powder (Gebhart's preferred brand) or 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper or pepper sauce
1 large bell pepper, red or yellow
2 to 3 (medium to spicy heat level) red or green finger chilies or Serrano peppers
High-temp cooking oil, such as peanut or safflower
A few curry leaves, optional but recommended
Juice of 1 lemon OR a few tablespoons Shaoxing or sherry OR 2 tablespoons vinegar, sherry or apple cider
A handful of cilantro tops, chopped
Traditional Basmati, for serving, optional, recipe follows
Mumbai Mule, for serving, recipe follows
5 cardamom pods or 1 black cardamom pod
Chili powder, for rimming the serving mug
Lavender sprig and lime wheel, for garnish

data.name: Indian Shrimp and Lentils
originalIngredient: 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon finely chopped peeled fresh ginger
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
1/2 cup lightly packed fresh cilantro, chopped

data.name: Indian Bread Omelet
originalIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Ketchup or spicy mustard, for serving, as desired

data.name: Instant Pot Indian Butter Chicken
originalIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts (about 3), cut into 1-inch chunks
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
6 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into pieces

data.name: Naan: Indian Oven-Baked Flat Bread

ingredient.name: Melted Butter Slathering On The Finished Naans

originalIngredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour, plus more for rolling, see Cook's Note*
1 teaspoon kalonji (nigella seeds), optional, see Cook's Note**
1 teaspoon fennel seeds, optional, see Cook's Note**
Melted butter for slathering on the finished naans

data.name: Indian Street Corn Salad
originalIngredient: 3 large ears corn, husks and silk removed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 cup halved cherry or sugarplum tomatoes
1 or 2 sprigs fresh mint, leaves thinly sliced
Small handful fresh cilantro, leaves and soft stems rustically ripped into bite-size pieces

data.name: Chinese Dumpling Soup
originalIngredient: 8 cups low-sodium chicken or mushroom broth
1 2-inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and julienned or cut into match sticks
1/4 cup Shaohsing rice cooking wine or pale dry sherry
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar/or 2 tablespoons black vinegar
2 carrots, thinly sliced on the bias- about 1 cup
24 frozen Chinese dumplings, pork, shrimp, or 1 pound package
3 scallions (white and green parts), thinly sliced

data.name: Chinese Chicken Salad
originalIngredient: 1/2 head napa cabbage, thinly shredded (about 6 cups)
3 scallions, trimmed and thinly sliced, greens included (about 1/2 cup)
1 (11-ounce) can Mandarin oranges in water, drained
1 1/2 teaspoons chili-garlic sauce or chili sauce

data.name: Barbecued Chinese Chicken Lettuce Wraps
originalIngredient: 1 1/3 to 1 1/2 pounds thin cut chicken breast or chicken tenders
2 tablespoons light colored oil, such as vegetable oil or peanut oil
Coarse salt and coarse black pepper
1 inch ginger root, finely chopped or grated, optional
1 small tin, 6 to 8 ounces, sliced water chestnuts, drained and chopped
3 tablespoons hoisin, Chinese barbecue sauce, available on Asian foods aisle of market
1/2 large head iceberg lettuce, core removed, head quartered
Wedges of navel orange -- platter garnish

data.name: Chinese Chicken Salad
originalIngredient: 1/2 pound asparagus, ends removed, and cut in thirds diagonally
1 red bell pepper, cored and seeded
2 scallions (white and green parts), sliced diagonally

data.name: Takeout-Style Chinese Spare Ribs
originalIngredient: 2 tablespoons honey, plus a bit extra to finish
2 racks spare ribs (8 to 10 pounds, St. Louis-style work best), individually sliced into single ribs

data.name: Glazed Chinese Long Beans
originalIngredient: Salt and freshly cracked black pepper

data.name: Chinese Chicken Salad
originalIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, grated on a rasp grater
3 cups chopped cooked chicken, preferably rotisserie

data.name: Beer Battered Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: 4 large baking potatoes, cut into French fry strips
1 1/2 pounds cod fillets, skinned with bones removed, and fish cut diagonally into 1-inch-wide strips (5- to 6-inches long)

data.name: Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: 3 teaspoons salt, plus more for seasoning
1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, plus more for seasoning
2 (8-ounce) cod or haddock fillets, cut in 1/2 on an angle

data.name: Baked Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless Pollock (or other firm white fish), cut into 2-by-4-inch pieces
Tartar sauce and/or malt vinegar, for serving (optional)

data.name: Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: 2 pounds (950 grams) floury potatoes, like russets, peeled and cut into large chips
2 egg whites, whipped to soft peaks
4 (9 ounce/250 gram) fillets haddock or cod, skin on, and pin boned

data.name: Traditional Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: 12 ounces potatoes, cut into chips (twice as thick as fries)
12 ounces all-purpose flour, plus more for dredging
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Six 6-ounce fillets cod, haddock or hake (less than 1-inch thick)

data.name: Easy Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour, plus more to dust fish
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 pounds cod fillets, cut in nice pieces
3 russet potatoes, very thinly and evenly sliced
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

data.name: Traditional British Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: 3 tablespoons kosher salt, plus more for fish
One 12-ounce bottle lager beer (the lighter and fizzier, the better)
3 pounds skinless, boneless large-flake white fish (we use wild Alaskan cod because of its quality and sustainability)

data.name: California Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: 2 quarts grapeseed or vegetable oil, for frying
3 pounds halibut or firm white fish, cut in 5 to 6 portions
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 quart egg wash (equal parts whole eggs and milk, mixed well)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

data.name: Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: Ten 6- to 7-ounce fillets cod or haddock

data.name: Beer-Battered Fish and Chips
originalIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds skinless Pacific cod fillet (in one piece), cut into 12 pieces
Malt vinegar and lemon wedges, for serving

data.name: Pancakes
originalIngredient: 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, plus more as needed

data.name: Fluffy Japanese Pancakes
originalIngredient: 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted and cooled, plus more for serving
1 large egg yolk plus 3 large egg whites

data.name: Blueberry Pancakes
originalIngredient: 1 cup milk, plus more if needed

data.name: "Instant" Pancake Mix
originalIngredient: 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda (check expiration date first)
1 stick butter, for greasing the pan
2 cups fresh fruit such as blueberries, if desired

data.name: Swedish Pancakes
originalIngredient: Confectioners' sugar, maple syrup and fresh fruit, for garnish

data.name: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
originalIngredient: 1 cup whole, 2 percent fat, or 1 percent fat milk
6 ounces semisweet chocolate chips, or less to taste

data.name: No Milk Pancakes
originalIngredient: Nonstick cooking spray, for the skillet

data.name: Vanilla Dutch Baby (Puffed Pancake)
originalIngredient: 3/4 cup milk, heated 20 to 30 seconds in the microwave

data.name: Fluffy Pancakes
originalIngredient: 1 large egg yolk, plus 3 egg whites
4 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted and cooled, plus more for brushing
Butter and maple syrup, for serving

data.name: Chocolate Ice Cream
originalIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces unsweetened cocoa powder, approximately 1/2 cup

data.name: Fried Ice Cream
originalIngredient: 3 scoops ice cream of your choice (vanilla, strawberry, pistachio)

data.name: Strawberry Ice Cream
originalIngredient: 1 pound strawberries, hulled, plus extra for serving

data.name: Avocado Ice Cream
originalIngredient: 12 ounces avocado meat, approximately 3 small to medium

data.name: No-Churn Vanilla Ice Cream
originalIngredient: 2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract or vanilla bean paste
Cookies and Cream: 12 chocolate sandwich cookies, crushed
Crunchy Cereal: 1 1/2 cups cinnamon crunch cereal, crushed
Cookies and Lemon: 1/2 cup jarred lemon curd and 1 cup shortbread cookies, crushed

data.name: Pasta Primavera
originalIngredient: 3 carrots, peeled and cut into thin strips
2 medium zucchini or 1 large zucchini, cut into thin strips
2 yellow squash, cut into thin strips
1 yellow bell pepper, cut into thin strips
1 red bell pepper, cut into thin strips
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 tablespoon dried Italian herbs or herbes de Provence

data.name: Pasta Primavera
originalIngredient: 2 large carrots, peeled and sliced diagonally
1 red bell pepper, seeded and sliced into strips
4 ounces white mushrooms, washed and sliced
1/2 cup chicken broth, plus more as needed

Salt and freshly ground black pepper
12 fresh basil leaves, chopped, plus more for serving
1 pound pasta (fettuccini), cooked according to package directions

data.name: Chicken Scampi Pasta
originalIngredient: 1 pound thinly-sliced chicken cutlets, cut into 1/2-inch-thick strips
1 teaspoon lemon zest plus the juice of 1 large lemon

data.name: Pasta Bolognese

ingredient.name: High Quality Extra Virgin Olive Oil

originalIngredient: 1 large onion or 2 small, cut into 1-inch dice
Extra-virgin olive oil, for the pan
3 pounds ground chuck, brisket or round or combination
1 bunch thyme, tied in a bundle
High quality extra-virgin olive oil, for finishing

data.name: Broccoli Pasta
originalIngredient: 2 pounds broccoli (about 2 heads, depending on the size), florets separated from the stems, stems peeled if really thick

data.name: Mushroom Pasta
originalIngredient: 1 pound fresh mushrooms (we used oyster mushrooms; see Cook's Note)
4 sprigs thyme or 1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves

data.name: Macaroni and Cheese
originalIngredient: 2 heaping teaspoons dry mustard (more if desired)
1 pound sharp Cheddar, grated (not pre-grated cheese), plus more for baking
Optional spices: cayenne pepper, paprika, thyme
Cooked sliders and/or macaroni and cheese, for serving

data.name: Mac and Cheese
originalIngredient: 1 1/2 cups fresh white bread crumbs (5 slices, crusts removed)

originalIngredient: 1 1/2 cups fresh white bread crumbs (5 slices, crusts removed)

originalIngredient: Two 10-ounce bricks sharp Cheddar cheese, grated (about 5 cups)

data.name: Cauliflower "Mac" and Cheese Casserole

1 large head cauliflower, cut into small florets

data.name: Cauliflower "Mac" and Cheese

1 tablespoon butter, plus more for the pan
